Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
